1: par <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas kun rig <mistake>mchog/dbag</mistake> <mistake>mond</mistake> <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas <mistake>spul</mistake> pa <mistake>yi//ska</mistake> ni bye ba 'gyed pa <mistake>po//skad</mistake> cig thams cad mngon par <mistake>togs//sems</mistake> kyi skad cig <mistake>don</mistake> kun <mistake>rig/ teg</mistake> pa <mistake>sna</mistake> tshogs thabs tshul
2: <mistake>gyis//'gro</mistake> <mistake>ba'i</mistake> don gyi rnam dbye <mistake>can//theg</mistake> pa gsum <mistake>gyinges</mistake> 'byung <mistake>ni//theg</mistake> pa gcig gi 'bras bur <mistake>gnas//nyon</mistake> mongs khams <mistake>rnams</mistake> dag <mistake>pa'bdag/las</mistake> kyi khams rnams zad byed <mistake>pa//tshu</mistake> <mistake>bo'</mistake>
3: <mistake>rca</mistake> mtsho kun las <mistake>brgal//sbyor</mistake> ba'i dgon <mistake>pa</mistake> las <mistake>byang</mistake> <mistake>ba//nyon</mistake> <mistake>mngos</mistake> nye nyon <mistake>ku na</mistake> nyon <mistake>mongs//bag</mistake> chags <mistake>bcal</mistake> pa rab spangs <mistake>pa//snying</mistake> <mistake>rjechen</mistake> po shes rab <mistake>thabs// don</mistake> yod 'gro ba'i don byed <mistake>pa//</mistake>
4: 'du shes thams cad rab spangs <mistake>don//rnam</mistake> shes don ni 'gog pa <mistake>'chang //sems</mistake> can kun gyi yid <mistake>kyi</mistake> <mistake>yul//sems</mistake> can kun gyi yid gnas <mistake>pa//sems</mistake> can kun gyi yid nang <mistake>gnas//de</mistake> dag sems
5: dang mnyam nyid <mistake>son//sems</mistake> can kun yid <mistake>tshem</mistake> par <mistake>byed//sems</mistake> can <mistake>zun</mistake> gyi yid dga' <mistake>ba//grub</mistake> mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa <mistake>min//'khrul</mistake> pa thams <mistake>cad</mistake> rnam par <mistake>spangs //don</mistake> gsum <mistake>the</mistake> tsom med
6: pa'i <mistake>blo//kun</mistake> don <mistake>yon</mistake> tan gsum gyi <mistake>bdag /dus</mistake> gsum phung po lnga yi <mistake>don//skad</mistake> cig thams cad rnam bsgom <mistake>pa//skan</mistake> cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs <mistake>rgyas//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi rang <mistake>bzhin</mistake> <mistake>'lms</mistake>
7: lus med sku ste sku yi mchog / sku ni byi <mistake>barnam</mistake> par <mistake>'gyed//gzugs</mistake> rnams ma lus kun du <mistake>ston //nor</mistake> bu chen po <mistake>ran</mistake> <mistake>shen</mistake> <mistake>tog /mnyam</mistake> pa <mistake>nyid</mistake> kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su <mistake>bcad</mistake> pa <mistake>nyi</mistake> shu <mistake>tsa</mistake> <mistake>bzhi'o///</mistake>
8: sangs rgyas kun <mistake>gi</mistake> rtogs bya <mistake>ba//sangs</mistake> rgyas byang chub bla na <mistake>med//gsang</mistake> <mistake>ngags</mistake> skye gnas yi ge <mistake>med//gsang</mistake> <mistake>sngags</mistake> chen po rigs gsum <mistake>pa// gsang</mistake> <mistake>sndags</mistake> don kun bskyed pa <mistake>po//thig</mistake> le <mistake>tchen</mistake> po
